subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: To start Coach Al Bagnoli’s tenure, Columbia unveiled a team long on spirit and determination, one that may rise or at least free itself of a burdensome losing streak that punctuates decades of failure.
snippet: To start Coach Al Bagnoli’s tenure, Columbia unveiled a team long on spirit and determination, one that may rise or at least free itself of a burdensome losing streak that punctuates decades of failure.
